name: Stuntman Water Park Run
description:
Stuntman Water Park Run is the new action adventure game with the beautiful graphics and amazing stunts. Now you don’t need to be afraid from open waters. you can enjoy the master challenges of water wipers, wrecking balls and bouncing punches in high-speed running game!

In Stuntman Water Run there are numbers of challenges and missions, starting missions are very easy but it will become impossible and challenging when you move up you will feel the real thrill and difficulty in high-speed running game. Balance yourself carefully on moving balancing platforms in sea run and be aware of boxing punches otherwise you will be smashed Badly in top runner game.

This is the best Kids Running Game in water run and a top high speed running games.
Stuntman Water Park Run Features:
● amazing new Colorful 3D graphics
● smooth controls
● responsive, intuitive and realistic Game play
●impossible Hurdle and stunts in racing modes
